data.name: infoRoomerData.CommandText
data.value: select d.DormID,r.RoomerID,PID,RTRIM(RoomerNameC) AS RoomerNameC ,RoomerNameE,dbo.funReturnListData('Gender',r.Gender) as GenderText, r.NationalityID,n.NationalityName,PhotoPath,d.Description as RoomID, RoomBedID,t.CustomerID,c.CustomerShortName,l.TranType ,dbo.funReturnListData('TranType',l.TranType) as TranTypeText ,CASE WHEN r.INCounts=1 THEN '內' ELSE '外' END as InOutStatus ,IsNull((Select top 1 CardNO from RoomerCards where RoomerID = r.RoomerID and EffectDate=(Select Max(EffectDate) from RoomerCards where RoomerID=r.RoomerID) and CreateDate=(Select Max(CreateDate) from RoomerCards where RoomerID=r.RoomerID)),'') as CardNO,r.CustNo from Roomer r inner join RoomerInOutLogs l on r.RoomerID = l.RoomerID inner join CustomerContracts t on l.ContractID = t.ContractID inner join Customers c on t.CustomerID =c.CustomerID inner join Nationality n on r.NationalityID = n.NationalityID inner join DormRoomBeds d on l.RoomBedID=d.BedID where l.EffectDate=(Select Max(EffectDate) from RoomerInOutLogs where RoomerID = r.RoomerID )

data.name: infoCommand1.CommandText
data.value: select d.DormID,r.RoomerID,PID,RTRIM(RoomerNameC) AS RoomerNameC ,RoomerNameE,dbo.funReturnListData('Gender',r.Gender) as GenderText, r.NationalityID,n.NationalityName,PhotoPath,d.Description as RoomID, RoomBedID,t.CustomerID,c.CustomerShortName,l.TranType ,dbo.funReturnListData('TranType',l.TranType) as TranTypeText ,CASE WHEN r.INCounts=1 THEN '內' ELSE '外' END as InOutStatus ,IsNull((Select top 1 CardNO from RoomerCards where RoomerID = r.RoomerID and EffectDate=(Select Max(EffectDate) from RoomerCards where RoomerID=r.RoomerID) and CreateDate=(Select Max(CreateDate) from RoomerCards where RoomerID=r.RoomerID)),'') as CardNO,r.CustNo from Roomer r inner join RoomerInOutLogs l on r.RoomerID = l.RoomerID inner join CustomerContracts t on l.ContractID = t.ContractID inner join Customers c on t.CustomerID =c.CustomerID inner join Nationality n on r.NationalityID = n.NationalityID inner join DormRoomBeds d on l.RoomBedID=d.BedID where l.EffectDate=(Select Max(EffectDate) from RoomerInOutLogs where RoomerID = r.RoomerID )

data.name: infoRoomerCard.CommandText
data.value: select r.RoomerID,r.RoomerNameC,d.Description as RoomBedID,Left(CONVERT(nvarchar(10),ca.CardDate,112),6) as sYM,COUNT(*) as iCount from Roomer r inner join RoomerInOutLogs l on r.RoomerID=l.RoomerID inner join CustomerContracts t on l.ContractID=t.ContractID inner join Customers c on t.CustomerID=c.CustomerID and c.CustomerID='C0001' inner join DormRoomBeds d on l.RoomBedID=d.BedID inner join RoomerCardDetails ca on r.RoomerID=ca.RoomerID where l.EffectDate=(Select Max(EffectDate) from RoomerInOutLogs where RoomerID = r.RoomerID ) and l.TranType!=2 and Left(CONVERT(nvarchar(10),ca.CardDate,112),6)= '201809' group by r.RoomerID,r.RoomerNameC,d.Description,Left(CONVERT(nvarchar(10),ca.CardDate,112),6) having COUNT(*)<=10

data.name: infoRoomCustList.CommandText
data.value: SELECT c.CustomerID,c.CustomerShortName,d2.Description as sRoom,d3.Description as sLevel,d3.BedID from Roomer r inner join RoomerInOutLogs l on r.RoomerID = l.RoomerID inner join CustomerContracts t on l.ContractID = t.ContractID inner join Customers c on t.CustomerID =c.CustomerID inner join DormRoomBeds d on l.RoomBedID=d.BedID left join DormRoomBeds d2 on d.ParentNodeID=d2.NodeID and d2.NodeLevel=2 left join DormRoomBeds d3 on d2.ParentNodeID=d3.NodeID and d3.NodeLevel=1 where l.EffectDate=(Select Max(EffectDate) from RoomerInOutLogs where RoomerID = r.RoomerID and TranType !=2) and convert(nvarchar(10),getdate(),111) between l.EffectDate and l.DueDate and t.CreateBy!='JB'
